abstract: Nearly a week of interruptions and slowdowns on Bank of America’s Web site spurred anger among account holders who were unable to pay bills electronically or check their balances.
snippet: Nearly a week of interruptions and slowdowns on Bank of America’s Web site spurred anger among account holders who were unable to pay bills electronically or check their balances.
lead_paragraph: After nearly a week of interruptions and slowdowns that made its Web site inaccessible at times, Bank of America said Wednesday the problems stemmed from a combination of heavy traffic along with the rollout of a new computer system.

headline.main: Heavy Traffic and New Computer System Disrupted Web Site, Bank of America Says
headline.print_headline: Heavy Traffic and New Computer System Disrupted Web Site, Bank of America Says
